about_me: I am a driven full-stack developer with a deep passion for solving complex problems through technology. Holding a degree in Computer Science (Software Engineering) from Universiti Teknologi Malaysia, I specialize in AI/ML applications, cloud computing, and scalable web development. I am particularly focused on integrating generative AI models to create innovative solutions that have a meaningful, real-world impact. With expertise in technologies such as React, Django, TypeScript, and AWS, I take pride in building secure, high-performance, and user-centric applications that are designed to scale and adapt. What excites me most is the constant opportunity to learn, evolve, and push the boundaries of what's possible in tech. My goal is to continually challenge myself and deliver solutions that not only drive the success of businesses but also enrich the lives of users in ways that truly matter.

education.study: Bachelor of Computer Science (Software Engineering) with Honours

contribution.c1: Co-founded MONITORSCAPE, a regulatory monitoring and stakeholder management SaaS platform, designed to empower public affairs professionals with efficient tools for legislative tracking and stakeholder engagement.
contribution.c2: Led the development of key platform features, including automated legislative bill tracking, real-time notifications, and an advanced stakeholder management system.
contribution.c3: Integrated generative AI (via ChatGPT API) to provide real-time summaries and categorize legal documents, significantly enhancing the user experience and reducing data processing time by 75%.
contribution.c4: Engineered full-stack web applications with a focus on scalability, security, and performance using Python, Django, React, PostgreSQL, and AWS.
contribution.c5: Utilized Docker and AWS to ensure high availability and manage containerized deployments, allowing the platform to scale seamlessly during traffic spikes.

work_experience.company: ARMO - Asociația Română a Magazinelor Online

contribution.c1: Contributed to the development of MONITORSCAPE, a regulatory monitoring and stakeholder management platform, by focusing on data scraping to automate the collection of legislative data from multiple government portals.
contribution.c2: Developed and optimized web scraping solutions that reduced data collection time from hours to minutes, enhancing the platform's ability to provide up-to-date legislative information in real-time.
contribution.c3: Assisted in integrating AI-powered features such as ChatGPT API for categorizing and summarizing legislative initiatives, contributing to the platform's intelligent automation.
contribution.c4: Gained hands-on experience in deploying and scaling web applications using AWS and Docker, ensuring platform stability, performance, and high availability during peak traffic periods.

contribution.c2: Engineered key features including automated legislative bill tracking, real-time notifications, and a robust stakeholder management system to improve user engagement and data accessibility.
contribution.c3: Led full-stack development using Python, Django, React, TypeScript, and AWS, ensuring the application is scalable and high-performing to handle increasing traffic and complexity.

project_experience.project: Quickride: Development of Transportation Services Mobile Application for University Students

contribution.c2: Implemented essential features like ridesharing, real-time location tracking, and secure cashless payments, significantly improving user convenience and accessibility.
